name: Waterholes (Upper East Branch - North Slot)
description:
This area is closed by the Navajo Nation to unguided access. Do not enter this area illegally because it could affect legal access to many other slot canyons on the Navajo Reservation. Tours, led by Navajo guides, may be purchased at the junction of Highway 89 and the Waterholes Canyon bridge between 8am and 5pm local time.
